data.persona: I am a huge fan of deep sea exploration, but I take any chance I can get to go for a swim. I love the feeling of water and compete with my friends to see who can hold his breath the longest. I wish I were a fish, and dislike mountains.
data.description:
You are in the Bank.
This is a grassy area that surrounds much of the swamp.  It's a plain field with some trees nearby along with some rocks.
There's a field, a swamp, a rock, a tree, and a bush here.
The alligator and the peasant are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to hit the alligator so that the alligator will not bite the peasant.
data.mid_motivation: I have come to the Bank to test my swimming skills in a swamp.
data.long_motivation: I need to continue practicing my swimming and building my body so that I can compete in the swimming competition.
